name: com.unlimited-fairytales.unityutils
description:
This is simple utilities and helpers.

* Dependencies must be installed manually.

Dependencies

- com.unity.ugui 2.0.0
    - Import TMP Essentials
- https://github.com/Cysharp/UniTask.git?path=src/UniTask/Assets/Plugins/UniTask
- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/dotween-hotween-v2-27676
    - Setup DOTween
    - Create ASMDEF
    - Project Settings > Player > Scripting Define Symbols > UNITASK_DOTWEEN_SUPPORT

samples.description:
PlayerLoopSample

- Build Profiles > Scene List > Add PlayerLoopSample_Additive

ScriptSample

Install

- https://github.com/GlitchEnzo/NuGetForUnity.git?path=/src/NuGetForUnity
    - CsvHelper 33.1.0

Project Settings > Scripting Define Symbols

- UNITYUTILS_CSVHELPER_SUPPORT

TapSample

- Project Settings > Player > Active Input Handling > Both
